title: 820-00165 would sometimes fail to turn on with a battery
message: hello guys , have got 820-00165 , would sometimes fail to start with the battery only , the machine will start and then go off before the screen could come on , other times the battery works great . I have replaced with another battery but still does the same thing . the machine charges the battery okay , and powers okay with the charger connected, also when the charger is removed, it remains on with the battery attached . have checked the battery SCL and SDA signal including current sensing , which are okay. would appreciate if am posted to where else I could check , thanks guys

title: 820-00165 would sometimes fail to turn on with a battery
message:
Any history available, liquid sign somewhere?

So it always turns on with battery only, but turns off after few seconds?

title: 820-00165 would sometimes fail to turn on with a battery
message: No liquid damage , ( it sometimes only turns on with the battery and then turn back off , but sometimes, will not at all, however , it always turns on with the charger , and the battery is good .

title: 820-00165 would sometimes fail to turn on with a battery
message:
Did you test with known good battery?
It always boot on original Magsafe 2 charger?
Do NOT use PSU, or adapter 1->2.

title: 820-00165 would sometimes fail to turn on with a battery
message: yes , I have tried a known good battery but still the same thing . It works okay with a charger connected , only issue is when I tried with the battery only

title: 820-00165 would sometimes fail to turn on with a battery
message:
It works good with battery and charger?
Does it charge the battery?

Post basic signals when doesn't want to turn on.

title: 820-00165 would sometimes fail to turn on with a battery
message: yes, it charges the battery , it works with battery and charger and also charger only

title: 820-00165 would sometimes fail to turn on with a battery
message: Try starting on battery only pressing power button 2-3s...

title: 820-00165 would sometimes fail to turn on with a battery
